original_text: And he would fain have filled his belly with the husks that the swine did eat: and no man gave unto him.
korean_text: 그가 돼지 먹는 쥐엄 열매로 배를 채우고자 하되 주는 자가 없는지라

sentences.original_text: And he would fain have filled his belly
with the husks that the swine did eat
and no man gave unto him
